  • Constructor Details

    • MinesweeperController

      public MinesweeperController(MinesweeperModel mod)
      The MinesweeperController Constructor.
      Parameters:
      mod - The model the controller will use.

  • Method Details

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      true if game is over, should check bombleft for winning or not.
      Returns:
      True if the game is over, false otherwise.

    • placeBomb

      public void placeBomb(int firstMoveR, int firstMoveC)
      This should be call after the user make the first move
      Parameters:
      firstMoveR - The row number of the bomb placement.
      firstMoveC - The col number of the bomb placement.

    • move

      public void move(int row, int col)
      Check if the move contain a bomb or not, it yes, set this.gameover to true. Else, reveal a location. notify the Observer.
      Parameters:
      row - The row selected for the move.
      col - The column selected for the move.

    • mark

      public void mark(int row, int col)
      flag or unflag a location. flag: guess if a location contains a bomb.
      Parameters:
      row - The row selected for the flag.
      col - The column selected for the flag.

    • getBombLeft

      public int getBombLeft()
      Return the bombs left in the game.
      Returns:
      numbers of bomb left.

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      return the board.
      Returns:
      board

    • getStartingVars

      public int[] getStartingVars()
      Returns the starting variables of the model.
      Returns:
      int[]

    • addObserver

      public void addObserver(Observer observer)
      Adds an observer to the model. Required for use with Observable.
      Parameters:
      observer - of the model.

    • saveGameState

      public void saveGameState(String filename, String colors)
      Saves the current state of the controller, model, board and loc Objects to the selected filename.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the save file.
      colors - The supplied colors of the current game state.

    • loadGameState

      public void loadGameState(String filename, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      loads a saved game located at filename to the stage.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the save file.
      stage - the currently active stage in View.
